meta.title: Maciej Toborek
meta.keywords: web developer, full stack develper, front end developer, back end developer, portfolio
meta.description: Hello! It's Maciej. I'm full stack of creativity web developer. If you're willing to hire me, write boldly üñê

heading.title: Maciej Toborek
heading.subtitle: Full Stack Web Developer
heading.desc: Hey! I'm 28 years old web developer based in London, born in Poland. I love creating apps using VueJs and Laravel. I have also good experience with Wordpress.

paragraphs.heading: In Social Interest Group I:
list: created scritpts to automate internal processes in organistaion
designed and developed rota management system that runs in 40 services
designed and coded custom Wordpress templates for orgainstation needs
developed IT asset management system for our needs
managed Active Directory, Azure and Intune

paragraphs.heading: As a freelancer after 9-5 job I:
list: designed and coded websites based on Wordpress
coded custom animations in CSS, SVG and Javascript
designed advertiesment banners and short videos
edited images in Affinity Designer and Gimp and Photoshop
configured evironments for web applications in Linux environment

paragraphs.heading: In niepsuj.it I:
list: built websites based on the Silex PHP framework
coded fancy animations in CSS3 and jQuery

list.text: During my employement I was awarded 'For Significant Creativity in the Business', 'For Going the Extra Mile' and 'For Initiative'
The UX designers were very impressed at how far you have come with the page, how good it looks and how well things are functioning. Your developers have done a fantastic job!

My admiration to the site has no limits!! The site is great. Really, really good job. We are delighted. I knew from the beginning that cooperation with you would be great, but the results positively surpassed me. Congratulations once again. I will be recommending you with confidence.
